generated_body: The article likely discusses a rental property featuring a master suite with an unconventional "open-concept" bathroom design that lacks doors or privacy, which is being offered for $1,200 per month. Readers can expect insights into the implications of such a layout on tenant privacy and lifestyle, as well as an analysis of the rental market dynamics that could justify this pricing. It may also explore potential reactions from prospective renters regarding the unique design choice, highlighting a growing trend in modern living spaces.
